metadataAttributes.Title: Genomic Data Science Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Be a next generation sequencing data scientist.. Master the tools and techniques at the forefront of the sequencing data revolution.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Bioinformatics, Statistics, Data Science, Computational Biology, Biopython, Python Programming, Genomics, Bioinformatics Algorithms, Algorithms, Algorithms On Strings, Samtools, Unix,
